description: Clarifying questions about server registry timeline and schema for W3 Health Monitoring integration

context.background: mcp-orchestration is implementing W3 Health Monitoring (Week 5-8) and needs ecosystem-manifest server registry for auto-discovery feature
context.blocker_status: P1 - Critical blocker for W3 implementation

questions.question: When will ecosystem-manifest repository be created? Is Week 4 delivery realistic for server registry v1.0?
questions.impact_if_delayed: Blocks auto-discovery, forces hardcoded server list (technical debt)

questions.question: What health check fields will registry include? (status, uptime, response_time?) What schema versioning strategy?
Can we get sample registry file for early integration testing? OpenAPI spec for registry API?
questions.importance: Medium - would accelerate integration, reduce risk
questions.workaround: Can mock registry structure if unavailable

workaround_plan.if_registry_delayed: Implement with hardcoded server list initially
workaround_plan.impact: Eliminates 15-20 min deployment time savings from auto-discovery

value_proposition.for_ecosystem_manifest: mcp-orchestration validates registry design with real integration
